"You spudnick, you!  Damn you, spuckley!" Hell Drak yelled, avoiding some o=
f the shits, but getting hit by some of the others.

She fired back two spu=
tnick lazer discuses.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Roland the La=
st Gunslinger 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, September 13=
, 2001 11:52 PM
  Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


  OOC: As tempted =
as I am, I cannot let my characters just explode. I need to keep repeating =
that to myself.

  BIC: Shokaract didn't expect the disks, and one hit him =
almost harmlessly, but the other sliced into him. Green goo sprayed from a =
crevice in his side. However, he was silent about it. He aimed the gattling=
 gun at Hell Drak and fired 3 laser bolts from it, then raised his tiny hot=
 dog gun and fired 4 shots from it, also aimed at Hell Drak...

    ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
    From: Testifier: Abyssian Badass 
    To: nbwrpg=
@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, September 13, 2001 7:28 AM
    Subjec=
t: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


    "No way, bitchwheat!" Hell Drak yelled=
, rolling and firing two lazer discs at Shokaract.
      ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
      From: Roland the Last Gunslinger 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoog=
roups.com 
      Sent: Wednesday, September 12, 2001 11:52 PM
      Subject=
: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


      It hit Shokaract. EXPLODE! Somehow, t=
he language woke Shokaract from his trance, not the missile. He transformed=
 into robot mode and beckoned Hell Drak to come closer with a movement of h=
is hand...

        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Testifier: =
Abyssian Badass 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Wednesda=
y, September 12, 2001 11:19 PM
        Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract=



        Hell Drak avoided the missile.

        "Not this time, fucko!" =
Hell Drak yelled, firing a lazer back at Shokaract.
          ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
          From: Roland the Last Gunslinger 
          To: =
nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Wednesday, September 12, 2001 9:53 =
PM
          Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


          The lasers hi=
s Shokaract all 4 times, but he didn't seem to notice, he was fixated on so=
me thing only he could see, something from his own mind. Ahh! PSYCHO! Shoka=
ract fires a single missile back at Hell Drak...

            ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
            From: Testifier: Abyssian Badass 
            =
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Wednesday, September 12, 2001=
 9:29 PM
            Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


            ::H=
eadshot/Hell Drak/Triggerhappy::

            Headshot ducked by a tree.  O=
ne of Orion's shots nailed him in the side.

            "Ah, f***!!!!!!!" =
Headshot yelled, holding his side in pain, getting up from being knocked do=
wn.

            Headshot climbed up into the tree, and fired a sniper shot=
 at Orion.  Headshot was standing up, so, if he was hit......(hint hint!)
 =
           ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
            Hell Drak was hit by the two missile=
s.  She went flying back into a wall.  Hell Drak fired 4 lazers at Shokarac=
t.
            ~~~~~~~~
            Triggerhappy flew out of the way of Ori=
on's shots.  Triggerhappy flew down, attempting to ram right into Orion!!!!=
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!


            Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject t=
o the Yahoo! Terms of Service. 



          Your use of Yahoo! Groups is s=
ubject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service. 


        Your use of Yahoo! Groups=
 is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.

ups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.

oups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
